question_group.name: Culinary Group
question_group.description: Example placeholder description text for Culinary Question Group. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vivamus imperdiet orci in feugiat tincidunt. Donec tempor suscipit accumsan. Vestibulum orci risus, mattis vitae ex et, consectetur consequat augue. Nunc et ante vel massa sollicitudin posuere vel ornare ligula. Ut a mattis massa. Mauris pulvinar congue sem, et venenatis orci vulputate id. Praesent odio purus, ultricies non eros at, iaculis imperdiet turpis. Donec non massa ligula.

translations.name: Pertanyaan Tentang Kuliner
translations.description: Contoh teks pengganti deskripsi untuk Grup Pertanyaan Kuliner. Demikian pula, tidak adakah orang yang mencintai atau mengejar atau ingin mengalami penderitaan, bukan semata-mata karena penderitaan itu sendiri, tetapi karena sesekali terjadi keadaan di mana susah-payah dan penderitaan dapat memberikan kepadanya kesenangan yang besar.

question_group.name: dependency_rule_example
question_group.label: Dependency Rule Example (OR/AND Logic)
question_group.description: This section demonstrates the new dependency_rule feature with OR and AND logic

translations.label: Contoh Aturan Ketergantungan (Logika OR/AND)
translations.description: Bagian ini mendemonstrasikan fitur baru dependency_rule dengan logika OR dan AND

question.name: dietary_preferences
question.label: Do you have any dietary preferences or restrictions?

translations.label: Apakah anda memiliki preferensi atau batasan makanan?

question.name: food_allergies
question.label: Do you have any food allergies?

question.name: special_menu_required
question.label: Would you like us to prepare a special menu for you?

translations.label: Apakah anda ingin kami mempersiapkan menu khusus untuk anda?

tooltip.text: This question appears if you have ANY dietary preferences OR ANY food allergies (OR logic)

translations.text: Pertanyaan ini muncul jika anda memiliki preferensi makanan ATAU alergi makanan (logika OR)

extra.content: üîç OR Logic Example: This question is visible because you selected dietary preferences OR food allergies (at least one condition is met)

translations.content: üîç Contoh Logika OR: Pertanyaan ini terlihat karena anda memilih preferensi makanan ATAU alergi makanan (setidaknya satu kondisi terpenuhi)

question.name: menu_customization_level
question.label: How much customization do you need?

translations.label: Seberapa banyak kustomisasi yang anda butuhkan?

question.name: chef_consultation_required
question.label: Would you like a consultation with our chef?

translations.label: Apakah anda ingin konsultasi dengan chef kami?

tooltip.text: This question appears only if you want special menu AND need significant/complete customization (AND logic)

translations.text: Pertanyaan ini muncul hanya jika anda ingin menu khusus DAN membutuhkan kustomisasi signifikan/lengkap (logika AND)

extra.content: üîç AND Logic Example: This question is visible because BOTH conditions are met: you want a special menu AND you need significant/complete customization

translations.content: üîç Contoh Logika AND: Pertanyaan ini terlihat karena KEDUA kondisi terpenuhi: anda ingin menu khusus DAN anda membutuhkan kustomisasi signifikan/lengkap

question.name: consultation_preferred_time
question.label: When would you prefer the consultation?

translations.label: Kapan anda lebih suka untuk konsultasi?

question.name: additional_notes
question.label: Any additional notes about your dietary needs?

translations.label: Ada catatan tambahan tentang kebutuhan makanan anda?

extra.content: Please provide any additional information that would help us better accommodate your dietary needs

translations.content: Silakan berikan informasi tambahan yang akan membantu kami lebih baik mengakomodasi kebutuhan makanan anda

question_group.name: Report by Province (Leading Question Example for Repeat Groups at Question Level)

question.name: Select Provinces that you want to report

translations.label: Pilih Provinsi yang ingin anda laporkan

question_group.name: Reported Provinces (Example of Repeatable Group at Question Level lead by 'Report by Province' Question)

question.name: What culinary dish or food item do you want to report in this province?

translations.label: Hidangan kuliner atau makanan apa yang ingin anda laporkan di provinsi ini?

question.name: Is this a signature/iconic dish of the province?

translations.label: Apakah ini merupakan hidangan khas/ikonik dari provinsi ini?

question.name: Describe why this is a signature dish (ingredients, history, cultural significance)

translations.label: Jelaskan mengapa ini merupakan hidangan khas (bahan-bahan, sejarah, makna budaya)

question.name: Add additional information about this dish?

translations.label: Tambahkan informasi tambahan tentang hidangan ini?

question.name: additional_comment
question.label: Additional comment

extra.content: üîç OR Logic Example: This question is visible because AT LEAST ONE condition is met: this is NOT a signature dish OR you want to add additional information

translations.content: üîç Contoh Logika OR: Pertanyaan ini terlihat karena SETIDAKNYA SATU kondisi terpenuhi: ini BUKAN hidangan khas ATAU anda ingin menambahkan informasi tambahan

question.name: Is this dish commonly available in local restaurants?

translations.label: Apakah hidangan ini umum tersedia di restoran lokal?

question.name: Provide details about where this dish can be found and its availability

translations.label: Berikan detail tentang di mana hidangan ini dapat ditemukan dan ketersediaannya

extra.content: üîç AND Logic Example: This question is visible because BOTH conditions are met: this is a signature dish AND it is commonly available in local restaurants

translations.content: üîç Contoh Logika AND: Pertanyaan ini terlihat karena KEDUA kondisi terpenuhi: ini adalah hidangan khas DAN umum tersedia di restoran lokal
